plants.name: Aningapara
plants.about: It is a tropical species that grows quickly and is easy to handle.
plants.water_tips: Keep the soil always moist without soaking it. Water twice a week.

plants.name: Zamioculca
plants.about: Although it blooms in the spring, it remains beautiful and green throughout the year.
plants.water_tips: Use pots with holes and stones at the bottom to facilitate drainage. Water once a day.

plants.name: Peperomia
plants.about: It adapts to both sun and shade, but prefers to stay in a cool corner without direct sunlight.
plants.water_tips: On hotter days, spray water on the leaves. Water three times a week.

plants.name: Imb√©
plants.about: A medium-sized plant that adapts to various regions and is easy to grow. It is gaining more and more fans.
plants.water_tips: Keep the soil always moist without soaking it. Water twice a week.

plants.name: Sansevieria
plants.about: The aroma reduces anxiety levels and its scent helps with sleep quality and productivity during the day.
plants.water_tips: Water the soil around it. Water once a day.

plants.name: Yucca
plants.about: Recommended because they are easy to maintain and care for. You can put them in small pots, or even in cups.
plants.water_tips: Thanks to the water reserve of these greens, it's always better to water sparingly. Water once a week.

plants.name: Fruit Trees
plants.about: Require a few hours of sun a day, so keep them near windows.
plants.water_tips: Water always in the soil and not the leaves. Water 3 times a week.

plants.name: Orchid
plants.about: Brings a feeling of tranquility and peace to the environment. Requires little maintenance and is great for those with limited space.
plants.water_tips: Water moderately. Water 4 times a week.

plants.name: Violet
plants.about: With delicate flowers. They are great suggestions for decorating the bathroom.
plants.water_tips: Do not wet the flowers and leaves. Water the soil 2 times a week.

plants.name: Hydrangea
plants.about: Hydrangea is a rustic plant and adapts to different types of soil.
plants.water_tips: Keep the soil always moist without overwatering. Water once a day.
